block_comment: This block of Verilog code is establishing a wire connection between the `cpu_d_writedata` variable and `E_st_data`. It uses the `assign` keyword to continuously drive the `cpu_d_writedata` with the value from `E_st_data`. This construct is typically used in combinational logic, ensuring that changes in `E_st_data` will be reflected immediately in `cpu_d_writedata`.
